name: Figma Design Workflow
description:
A practical implication of the double diamond design process in Figma.

Two-part frames that explain: 
1. Figma Structure
2. Figma File Workflow

This design process sits within a larger product development process that can be found here: https://www.figma.com/community/file/874567511540197545/%E2%88%9E-Product-Development-Process

This process should only be considered for a design team size of 3+ and beyond (premature optimization of features, processes, and systems is one of the deadly sins).
